__e: His head is on her knees.
Now the woman has her head in the guy's lap.
As an American, it's my right to eat without touching knees with some dude.
There's nothing wrong with my knees! It's my lumbago.
If it weren't for my knees, I'd never have met you.
My... my knees aren't what they used to be.
Then you picked your head up off of his lap
You know, one day, my mother, she put me on her knee and she said to me,
put your head between your knees and shut up if you want to live.
I can't, my knees are in the way.

I'm too old and my knees are shot-- but, but you?
